doc.field: Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 5
Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 5

1. Lesbian and Gay News: Andy Humm and Lee Sharmat discuss recent general events that relate to the LGBT community. Includes footage of Ed Koch regarding NYC Mayor Rudy Giuliani's treatment of Ramon Cortines.

2. Interview: Tom Beer, [filmmaker] with AIDS Community Television, and Kate Barnhart, activist with YELL and ACTUP, discuss Beer's film "Peer Education, Not Fear Education", in which Barnhart appears. Includes film clip.
COMMERCIAL: "Panic Disorder: It's real. It's treatable", National Institute of Mental Health
COMMERCIAL: Lesbian and Gay Public Awareness Project, tells the story of Bobby Griffith
5. African American Athletes, Success After Success: Willie Davis
COMMERCIAL: Elizabeth Taylor for AmFAR, "Don't make it five thousand and one"
6. Clip from Tracey Ullman's show ["Tracey Takes Onâ€¦"]. Includes introduction by Andy Humm.
COMMERCIAL: National Foundation for Infectious Diseases, C. Everett Koop, PSA for Hepatitis A
COMMERCIAL: "A Living Memorial to the Holocaust Museum of Jewish Heritage"
7. Footage of Men of Discipline anniversary party at The Lure.
COMMERCIAL: GMHC (Gay Men's Health Crisis), "Fight the Fear"
9. Footage of cast of "Hello, Dolly!" performing "One Night in Heaven".
